name: lenny-dnd-bot
excerpt: A Discord bot for Dungeons & Dragons with dice rolling, data lookup, homebrew support, character generation, sound effects, and more.
description:
A Discord bot for Dungeons & Dragons players with modern features powered by 5e.tools for up-to-date data.

Features

  • Dice Rolls: Roll dice with flexibility and customization.
  • D&D Data Lookup: Get detailed D&D information directly in Discord.
  • D&D Homebrew Data: Manage custom homebrew data for your server.
  • Customizable Embeds: Personalize dice roll visual appeals.
  • Character Stat Rolling: Automate D&D character stat generation.
  • Voice Chat Sound Effects: Enhance rolls with immersive sound effects.
  • Token-Image Generation: Create 5e.tools-style token images swiftly.
  • Initiative Tracking: Easily track combat initiatives with buttons.
  • Discord Utilities: Various commands for session planning and sound effects.
